title: Freaky! Love it
review: Loved it, the best horror movie of 2018. Love Tony Collete. She plays her character spook well. Freaked me! And her daughter in the movie... Wow... And her son n husband... Wow!

title: Thank you for 10 years of great entertainment!
review:
Thank you for 10 years of great entertainment! Loved all the 22 movies and can't wait to see the next 22.
A great ending to a 2 part movie. All was 5 stars, ALL! Masterpieces! Will rewatch all, forever... AVENGERS!

title: Captivating beautiful true story
review: Really enjoyed watching. Beautifully told true story. Good pace. Emotive and captivating. And of course fantastic cast and acting. Oscar winner!
